content:
File config

This file demonstrate the config possibilities available in the front matter of the files.

The file name is front-matter.md, but the front-matter can overhidde the doc slug and label:

slug: 'front-demo'
label: 'File config'

So the label of this file is becomes File config, and its slug front-demo.

Note on the front matter

EasyDocs uses gray-matter to parse the YAML front matters of the files. Thus the front matter should be in the YAML format and wrapped between two ---, as below:

---
hello: 'Hello world!'
---
label: File config
